edu.oakland.classProject.production

Interface IDisplay

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutomatedDisplay, MockDisplay

    public interface IDisplay
    IDisplay represents the interface that the UI must implement.

    • Method Summary

      • getEndGameConfirmation

        void getEndGameConfirmation(int guess,
                            int guessIteration)
        Displays the end game UI
        Parameters:
        guess - the final answer for the game session
        guessIteration - the number of guesses it took to end the current game session
